snippet: An exhibition at the Guggenheim Museum will focus on the Italian avant-garde from 1909 to 1944, a period that Sotheby’s will also highlight in a Nov. 6 auction.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; exhibition at Guggenheim Museum focuses on Italian avant-garde from 1909 to 1944, Sotheby's will also highlight period in auction; many changes are underfoot at Morgan Library & Museum; Museum of Modern Art creates  partnership with graduate art history programs at several universities to foster closer ties between museum curators and academia.
lead_paragraph: An exhibition at the Guggenheim Museum will focus on the Italian avant-garde from 1909 to 1944, a period that Sotheby’s will also highlight in a Nov. 6 auction.

headline.main: ‘Italian Futurism’ Is Coming to the Guggenheim
